about_the_game:
Sammy-supervised PSP classic "Phantom Thief Twin Angel - Labyrinth of Time and World" gets HD remaster!
The remaster features full HD visuals, remastered sound effects, multilingual support, and other optimizations for a modern visual novel experience.
Kiichi Kanoh, the director and writer of the original PSP game, returns as executive producer.

Story

Haruka Minazuki and Aoi Kannazuki are ordinary schoolgirls at St. Cherine School.
But by night, they transform into the righteous heroines, 'Phantom Thief Angels TwinAngel'!

Balancing school life with their nighttime battles against a massive conspiracy, they work alongside Kurumi Hazuki, Tesla, and Nine to thwart the evil organization The Black Fund.

Though they successfully reclaim the stolen artifact 'Tears of an Angel,' their victory is short-lived.
The artifact is stolen again, leading them on a new adventure where they encounter two unfamiliar Phantom Thief Angels.
Discover the secrets behind the birth of 'TwinAngel' and witness the power of their unwavering bonds.

Key Features

The story branches significantly based on the player's choice of protagonist: Haruka or Aoi.
This choice affects everything from minor dialogue changes to entirely different scenes.
A free demo showcasing the first five chapters of Haruka’s route is available now.

ⒸSammy ⒸBit groove promotion Inc. ⒸALTERCIWS LLC/Lobstudio Inc.
